ResearchProjectDef.label: mechanite assembly
ResearchProjectDef.description: Design simple mechanites to assemble or repair objects, atom-by-atom.

ResearchProjectDef.label: bio-mechanite integration
ResearchProjectDef.description: Design more specialized mechanites to interface with, and improve upon, biology.

ResearchProjectDef.label: swarm intelligence
ResearchProjectDef.description: Grant a gestalt intelligence to mechanite swarms, allowing them to collectively diagnose and repair injuries - or even death.

ResearchProjectDef.label: archogenetics
ResearchProjectDef.description: ---REQUIRES BIOTECH DLC---\n\nDevelop your own strain of archites, adding archite capsules and archogene packs to your spore's gift options.

ResearchProjectDef.label: organ redesign
ResearchProjectDef.description: Reinvent biology from the molecular level upward, creating vastly superior organs.

ResearchProjectDef.label: animal redesign
ResearchProjectDef.description: Surpass natural evolution, creating an ecosystem of purpose-built creatures which need not kill, die, or suffer - and which provide great benefits to their human companions.

ResearchProjectDef.label: plant redesign
ResearchProjectDef.description: Surpass natural evolution, creating an ecosystem of purpose-built plants which provide great benefits to humans.

ResearchProjectDef.label: mechanite disassembly
ResearchProjectDef.description: Design mechanites which break down matter atom-by-atom - useful for recycling unwanted items, or "recycling" enemy ships.

ResearchProjectDef.label: matter optimization
ResearchProjectDef.description: Automatically upgrade ship hull to archotech hull. This will not affect large structures such as heatsinks or shield generators.

ResearchProjectDef.label: psychic field formation
ResearchProjectDef.description: Discover the basic principles of psychic interaction, allowing your archotech spore to begin generating a psychic field.
ResearchProjectDef.discoveredLetterText: Your archotech spore has begun generating a psychic field. Once you have accumulated enough Field Strength and completed the necessary research, you can request your archotech spore to perform certain psychic feats. Field Strength grows slowly on its own, and is slightly increased by having colonists meditate nearby, but can be greatly boosted by installing archotech pillars.

ResearchProjectDef.label: psychic field manipulation
ResearchProjectDef.description: Utilize your psychic field to generate simple sensations, soothing an entire region or overwhelming a single individual.

ResearchProjectDef.label: broad manipulation
ResearchProjectDef.description: Psychically transmit messages and dreams to thousands of individuals, influencing a faction's opinion of you. Contact them using a comms console to use this ability.

ResearchProjectDef.label: psylink
ResearchProjectDef.description: ---REQUIRES ROYALTY DLC---\n\nEnable your archotech spore to grant psylink to colonists. This consumes a considerable amount of Field Strength.

ResearchProjectDef.label: psychic effectors
ResearchProjectDef.description: Design limited-use psychic effectors such as shock lances and animal pulsers.

ResearchProjectDef.label: psychic weaponry
ResearchProjectDef.description: Design ship weaponry which utilizes psychic phenomena to incapacitate enemy crew.

ResearchProjectDef.label: exotic particles
ResearchProjectDef.description: Expand on the commonly-understood laws of physics, discovering a variety of particles with exotic behaviors.

ResearchProjectDef.label: vanometrics
ResearchProjectDef.description: Design vanometric power cells, which generate free energy without using fuel.

ResearchProjectDef.label: advanced shields
ResearchProjectDef.description: Utilize exotic particles to improve the efficiency of your ship's shields.

ResearchProjectDef.label: anti-entropics
ResearchProjectDef.description: Utilize exotic particles to construct heat converters which eliminate heat altogether, rather than radiating it out to space.

ResearchProjectDef.label: matter inversion
ResearchProjectDef.description: Develop a method for efficiently producing antigrain shells from exotic particles.

ResearchProjectDef.label: antimatter thruster
ResearchProjectDef.description: Utilize exotic particles for thrust in combat.

ResearchProjectDef.label: antimatter reactor
ResearchProjectDef.description: Utilize exotic particles to quickly generate vast amounts of power.

ResearchProjectDef.label: locate alpha pillar
ResearchProjectDef.description: Discover the location of an archotech pillar. This particular specimen is somewhere in orbit.
ResearchProjectDef.discoveredLetterText:
You have managed to discern the location of an archotech pillar! This specimen resides aboard the KSS Horizon, an ancient terraforming station.

Scans indicate the station's dome section has maintained a functioning ecosystem for thousands of years. However, it is currently occupied by a clan of space pirates - and, given the number of heavy armaments they have mounted on the station's hull, they intend to discourage visitors.

You will need to engage the Horizon in ship combat from your bridge.

ResearchProjectDef.label: locate beta pillar
ResearchProjectDef.description: Discover the location of an archotech pillar. This particular specimen is somewhere on one of the planet's moons.
ResearchProjectDef.discoveredLetterText:
You have managed to discern the location of an archotech pillar! This specimen is apparently being studied by a mechanoid hive on one of the planet's moons.

Scans indicate the hive is defended by a very large mechanoid warship.

You will need to load a shuttle with your raiding party, then select the "Moon Hive" option - at which point you will have to fight two simultaneous battles, one on the surface and one against the warship. Be sure your shuttle is fully fueled.

ResearchProjectDef.label: locate gamma pillar
ResearchProjectDef.description: Discover the location of an archotech pillar. This particular specimen is somewhere on the planet's surface.
ResearchProjectDef.discoveredLetterText:
You have managed to discern the location of an archotech pillar! This specimen is the most sacred artifact of the planet's tribal cultures, referred to as the Star Totem.

It was once a sacred meeting place where rival tribes spoke under a banner of peace, but has been captured and defiled by a savage berserker clan.

When your raiding party arrives at the site, they will be joined by allies from any tribes you have befriended, eager to see the sacred totem return to friendly hands.

ResearchProjectDef.label: locate delta pillar
ResearchProjectDef.description: Discover the location of an archotech pillar. This particular specimen is somewhere beneath the planet's crust.
ResearchProjectDef.discoveredLetterText:
You have managed to discern the location of an archotech pillar! This specimen sits deep underground, at the center of a colossal insect hive.

Scans detect a large breeding population of Sorne Geneline insects as well as several anomalous readings - perhaps archospiders or something even worse.

Your raiding party is advised to train in close-quarters combat...
